summary: A middle-aged man tries to reconnect with his illegitimate son, who was given to an orphanage many years ago.
cast: James Cagney|Barbara Stanwyck|Walter Pidgeon|Betty Lou Keim|Don Dubbins|Edward Andrews|Basil Ruysdael|Grandon Rhodes|Will Wright|Lewis Martin|Dorothy Adams|Dean Jones|Herb Vigran|Bob Alden|Byron Amidon|Margaret Bert|Nesdon Booth|Lovyss Bradley|Don Burnett|Frank Connor|Charles Evans|Elizabeth Flournoy|Bess Flowers|William Forrest|Eleanor Grumer|Robert Haines|Jimmy Hayes|Charles Herbert|Mary Alan Hokanson|Edna Holland|Bruce Irwin|Jack Kenney|Lois Kimbrell|Janet Lake|Michael Landon|Tom Laughlin|Mary Lawrence|Luana Lee|Ruth Lee|John Maxwell|Ricky McGough|Harold Miller|Matt Moore|Kathleen Mulqueen|Burt Mustin|Ralph Neff|Jimmy Ogg|Marc Platt|Lillian Powell|Paul Power|Joy Rogers|Russell Simpson|Bert Stevens|Audrey Swanson|Hal Taggart|Charles Tannen|Sid Tomack|Louis Towers|Harry Tyler|Leon Tyler|Emmett Vogan|Billy Wayne|Russ Whitney|James Yoham
title: These Wilder Years
